column2: Name and brief biographical information of the named creator or creators in the design and production of the monument
Role of the creator in the creation of the monument
Name of the culture, nationality, or people from which the monument originated
Titles, names, or identifying phrases given to a monument
Term or terms identifying the specific type of monument being described
Concise description of the date or range of dates associated with the creation, design, or construction of the monument
Year that broadly delimits the beginning of an implied date span.
Year that broadly delimits the end of an implied date span.
Controlled list, before or after the Common Era (CE)
Record of alteration of the monument or its components
Term that identifies the named, defined period whose characteristics are represented in the monument
Indication of the substances or materials used in the creation of a monument, as well as any implements, production or manufacturing techniques, processes, or methods incorporated in its fabrication
Information about the dimensions, size, or scale of the monument
Precise notational location from excavation record
Description of the spatial, chronological, or contextual aspects of the work as captured in this particular image
Terms that identify, describe, and/or interpret what is depicted in and by a monument
